title: Understanding Features in Data Analysis
text: In data analysis, a feature is an individual measurable property or characteristic of a phenomenon being observed. Think about what kind of data points might help predict whether a customer will leave.

title: Identifying Relevant Features
text: Consider what information about a customer might change over time and could influence their decision to stay or leave.

title: Evaluating Potential Features
text: Which of the following could be considered a feature in the dataset for predicting customer churn?
